df-cyg
blocks.content: Define a cyclic group, which is a group with an element ` x ` , called the generator of the group, such that all elements in the group are multiples of ` x ` . A generator is usually not unique. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)

blocks.name: iscyg
blocks.content: Definition of a cyclic group. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm iscyg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, ccyg), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(crn(cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), c1))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmg, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, ccyg), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(crn(cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), c1)))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, ccyg), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(crn(cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), c1)))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, ccyg), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(crn(cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), c1)))), diffsc(s1, c1))
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, ccyg), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(crn(cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), c1)))), diffsc(s1, c2))
  elrab2(hs0, c0, ccyg, cgrp, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(crn(cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), c1)), wrex(s0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), wceq(crn(cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), cfv(cmg, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))))
  rexeqbidv(s0, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(crn(cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), cfv(cmg, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), wceq(crn(cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), c1))
  eqeq12d(crn(cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), cfv(cmg, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), crn(cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  rneqd(cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), cfv(cmg, cv(hs0)), cv(s0))), cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  mpteq2dv(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), cfv(cmg, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveqd(cv(s1), cfv(cmg, cv(hs0)), cv(s0), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cmg, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(cmg, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cmg)
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cbs)
  df-cyg(hs0, s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cgrp)
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, c1, wceq(crn(cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))), c1)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm iscyg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ CycGrp ↔(c0 ∈ Grp ∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c1, ran((s1 ∈ ℤ ↦(s1[c2]s0)))= c1)))
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(.g ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈ CycGrp ↔(c0 ∈ Grp ∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c1, ran((s1 ∈ ℤ ↦(s1[c2]s0)))= c1))), d(s0, c1))
  a1ii((c0 ∈ CycGrp ↔(c0 ∈ Grp ∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c1, ran((s1 ∈ ℤ ↦(s1[c2]s0)))= c1))), d(s0, c2))
  a1ii((c0 ∈ CycGrp ↔(c0 ∈ Grp ∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c1, ran((s1 ∈ ℤ ↦(s1[c2]s0)))= c1))), d(s1, c1))
  a1ii((c0 ∈ CycGrp ↔(c0 ∈ Grp ∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c1, ran((s1 ∈ ℤ ↦(s1[c2]s0)))= c1))), d(s1, c2))
  elrab2(hs0, c0, ccyg, cgrp, ∃(s0 ∈ c1, ran((s1 ∈ ℤ ↦(s1[c2]s0)))= c1), ∃(s0 ∈(Base ` hs0), ran((s1 ∈ ℤ ↦(s1[(.g ` hs0)]s0)))=(Base ` hs0)))
  rexeqbidv(s0, (Base ` hs0), c1, hs0 = c0, ran((s1 ∈ ℤ ↦(s1[(.g ` hs0)]s0)))=(Base ` hs0), ran((s1 ∈ ℤ ↦(s1[c2]s0)))= c1)
  eqeq12d(ran((s1 ∈ ℤ ↦(s1[(.g ` hs0)]s0))), (Base ` hs0), ran((s1 ∈ ℤ ↦(s1[c2]s0))), c1, hs0 = c0)
  rneqd((s1 ∈ ℤ ↦(s1[(.g ` hs0)]s0)), (s1 ∈ ℤ ↦(s1[c2]s0)), hs0 = c0)
  mpteq2dv(s1, cz, (s1[(.g ` hs0)]s0), (s1[c2]s0), hs0 = c0)
  oveqd(s1, (.g ` hs0), s0, c2, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((.g ` hs0), c2, (.g ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cmg)
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs0), c1, (Base ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cbs)
  df-cyg(hs0, s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cgrp)
  diff.hs0.w(∃(s0 ∈ c1, ran((s1 ∈ ℤ ↦(s1[c2]s0)))= c1))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm iscyggen(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wceq(crn(cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c3, c0))), c2)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmg, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, crab(s1, c2, wceq(crn(cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)))), c2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wceq(crn(cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c3, c0))), c2))), wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c4)))
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wceq(crn(cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c3, c0))), c2))), wceq(c3, cfv(cmg, c4)))
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wceq(crn(cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c3, c0))), c2))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wceq(crn(cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c3, c0))), c2))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wceq(crn(cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c3, c0))), c2))), diffsc(s0, c4))
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wceq(crn(cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c3, c0))), c2))), diffsc(s1, c4))
  elrab2(s1, c0, c1, c2, wceq(crn(cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c3, c0))), c2), wceq(crn(cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)))), c2))
  eqeq1d(crn(cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)))), c2, crn(cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c3, c0))), wceq(cv(s1), c0))
  rneqd(cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c3, c0)), wceq(cv(s1), c0))
  mpteq2dva(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c3, c0), wceq(cv(s1), c0))
  oveq2d(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1), c0, wa(wceq(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cz)))
  simpl(wceq(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cz))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, crn(cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c3, c0))), c2)
  diff.crn.s(s1, cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c3, c0)))
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c3, c0))
  diff.cz.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, cv(s0), c3, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s1), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

thm iscyggen(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 ↔(c0 ∈ c2 ∧ ran((s0 ∈ ℤ ↦(s0[c3]c0)))= c2))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c4)
  ⊣ c3 =(.g ` c4)
  ⊣ c1 = { s1 ∈ c2 | ran((s0 ∈ ℤ ↦(s0[c3]s1)))= c2 }
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈ c1 ↔(c0 ∈ c2 ∧ ran((s0 ∈ ℤ ↦(s0[c3]c0)))= c2)), c2 =(Base ` c4))
  a1ii((c0 ∈ c1 ↔(c0 ∈ c2 ∧ ran((s0 ∈ ℤ ↦(s0[c3]c0)))= c2)), c3 =(.g ` c4))
  a1ii((c0 ∈ c1 ↔(c0 ∈ c2 ∧ ran((s0 ∈ ℤ ↦(s0[c3]c0)))= c2)), d(s0, c2))
  a1ii((c0 ∈ c1 ↔(c0 ∈ c2 ∧ ran((s0 ∈ ℤ ↦(s0[c3]c0)))= c2)), d(s0, c3))
  a1ii((c0 ∈ c1 ↔(c0 ∈ c2 ∧ ran((s0 ∈ ℤ ↦(s0[c3]c0)))= c2)), d(s0, c4))
  a1ii((c0 ∈ c1 ↔(c0 ∈ c2 ∧ ran((s0 ∈ ℤ ↦(s0[c3]c0)))= c2)), d(s1, c4))
  elrab2(s1, c0, c1, c2, ran((s0 ∈ ℤ ↦(s0[c3]c0)))= c2, ran((s0 ∈ ℤ ↦(s0[c3]s1)))= c2)
  eqeq1d(ran((s0 ∈ ℤ ↦(s0[c3]s1))), c2, ran((s0 ∈ ℤ ↦(s0[c3]c0))), s1 = c0)
  rneqd((s0 ∈ ℤ ↦(s0[c3]s1)), (s0 ∈ ℤ ↦(s0[c3]c0)), s1 = c0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, cz, (s0[c3]s1), (s0[c3]c0), s1 = c0)
  oveq2d(s0, c3, s1, c0, (s1 = c0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℤ))
  simpl(s1 = c0, s0 ∈ ℤ)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, ran((s0 ∈ ℤ ↦(s0[c3]c0))), c2)
  diff.crn.s(s1, (s0 ∈ ℤ ↦(s0[c3]c0)))
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, s0, cz, (s0[c3]c0))
  diff.cz.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, s0, c3, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, s1, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
}

thm iscyggen2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cgrp), wb(wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c1, c3), wral(s0, c3, wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c4, c1)))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cmg, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, crab(s2, c3, wceq(crn(cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2)))), c3)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)

  -| diffsc(s2, c0)

  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cgrp), wb(wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c1, c3), wral(s0, c3, wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c4, c1))))))), diffss(s0, s2))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cgrp), wb(wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c1, c3), wral(s0, c3, wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c4, c1))))))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cgrp), wb(wcel(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c1, c3), wral(s0, c3, wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c4, c1))))))), diffsc(s0, c2))

  iscyggen(s1, s2, c1, c2, c3, c4, c0)
  pm5.32da(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c3), wceq(crn(cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), c4, c1))), c3), wral(s0, c3, wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c4, c1)))))
  syl6bb(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c3)), wceq(crn(cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), c4, c1))), c3), wral(s0, c3, wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c4, c1)))), wss(c3, crn(cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), c4, c1)))))
  3syl(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c3)), wb(wceq(crn(cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), c4, c1))), c3), wss(c3, crn(cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), c4, c1))))), wf(cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), c4, c1)), cz, c3), wss(crn(cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), c4, c1))), c3))
  fmpttd(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), c4, c1), c3, wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c3)))
  an32s(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c3), wcel(cv(s1), cz), wcel(co(cv(s1), c4, c1), c3))
  3expa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(cv(s1), cz), wcel(c1, c3), wcel(co(cv(s1), c4, c1), c3))
  mulgcl(c0, cv(s1), c1, c3, c4)
  frn(cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), c4, c1)), cz, c3)
  baib(wss(crn(cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), c4, c1))), c3), wceq(crn(cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), c4, c1))), c3), wss(c3, crn(cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), c4, c1)))))
  eqss(crn(cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), c4, c1))), c3)

  elrnmpti(s1, cv(s0), cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), c4, c1)), cz, co(cv(s1), c4, c1))
  eqid(cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), c4, c1)))
  ovex(cv(s1), c4, c1)
  diff.cz.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c3))

thm iscyggen2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Grp →(c1 ∈ c2 ↔(c1 ∈ c3 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c3, ∃(s1 ∈ ℤ, s0 =(s1[c4]c1))))))
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(.g ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 = { s2 ∈ c3 | ran((s1 ∈ ℤ ↦(s1[c4]s2)))= c3 }
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c4)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈ Grp →(c1 ∈ c2 ↔(c1 ∈ c3 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c3, ∃(s1 ∈ ℤ, s0 =(s1[c4]c1)))))), d(s0, s2))

thm iscyg3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ CycGrp ↔(c0 ∈ Grp ∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∃(s2 ∈ ℤ, s1 =(s2[c2]s0))))))

  a1ii((c0 ∈ CycGrp ↔(c0 ∈ Grp ∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∃(s2 ∈ ℤ, s1 =(s2[c2]s0)))))), d(s1, c0))
  bitri(c0 ∈ CycGrp, (c0 ∈ Grp ∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∃(s2 ∈ ℤ, s1 =(s2[c2]s0))))), (c0 ∈ Grp ∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c1, ran((s2 ∈ ℤ ↦(s2[c2]s0)))= c1)))

  rexbidva(s0, c1, c0 ∈ Grp, ran((s2 ∈ ℤ ↦(s2[c2]s0)))= c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∃(s2 ∈ ℤ, s1 =(s2[c2]s0))))
  syl6bb((c0 ∈ Grp ∧ s0 ∈ c1), ran((s2 ∈ ℤ ↦(s2[c2]s0)))= c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∃(s2 ∈ ℤ, s1 =(s2[c2]s0))), c1 ⊆ ran((s2 ∈ ℤ ↦(s2[c2]s0))))
  3syl((c0 ∈ Grp ∧ s0 ∈ c1), (ran((s2 ∈ ℤ ↦(s2[c2]s0)))= c1 ↔ c1 ⊆ ran((s2 ∈ ℤ ↦(s2[c2]s0)))), ((s2 ∈ ℤ ↦(s2[c2]s0)): ℤ → c1), ran((s2 ∈ ℤ ↦(s2[c2]s0)))⊆ c1)

  3expa(c0 ∈ Grp, s2 ∈ ℤ, s0 ∈ c1, (s2[c2]s0)∈ c1)
  mulgcl(c0, s2, s0, c1, c2)
  frn((s2 ∈ ℤ ↦(s2[c2]s0)), cz, c1)
  baib(ran((s2 ∈ ℤ ↦(s2[c2]s0)))⊆ c1, ran((s2 ∈ ℤ ↦(s2[c2]s0)))= c1, c1 ⊆ ran((s2 ∈ ℤ ↦(s2[c2]s0))))
  eqss(ran((s2 ∈ ℤ ↦(s2[c2]s0))), c1)

thm iscygd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccyg))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmg, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c2, c3))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, wcel(c0, ccyg), wcel(c0, cgrp), wne(crab(hs0, c1, wceq(crn(cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(hs0)))), c1)), emptycls))
  ne0d(crab(hs0, c1, wceq(crn(cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(hs0)))), c1)), c3, w0)
  mpbir2and(w0, wcel(c3, crab(hs0, c1, wceq(crn(cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(hs0)))), c1))), wcel(c3, c1), wral(s0, c1, wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c2, c3)))))
  ralrimiva(s0, c1, w0, wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c2, c3))))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c3, crab(hs0, c1, wceq(crn(cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(hs0)))), c1))), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wral(s0, c1, wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c2, c3)))))), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  iscyggen2(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c3, crab(hs0, c1, wceq(crn(cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(hs0)))), c1)), c1, c2)
  iscyg2(hs0, s1, c0, crab(hs0, c1, wceq(crn(cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(hs0)))), c1)), c1, c2)
  eqid(crab(hs0, c1, wceq(crn(cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(hs0)))), c1)))
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.crab.s(s0, hs0, c1, wceq(crn(cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(hs0)))), c1))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, crn(cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(hs0)))), c1)
  diff.crn.s(s0, cmpt(s1, cz, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(hs0))))
  diff.cmpt.s(s0, s1, cz, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(hs0)))
  diff.cz.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(s1), c2, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ CycGrp)

  sylanbrc(w0, c0 ∈ CycGrp, c0 ∈ Grp, { hs0 ∈ c1 | ran((s1 ∈ ℤ ↦(s1[c2]hs0)))= c1 } ≠ ∅)

  ralrimiva(s0, c1, w0, ∃(s1 ∈ ℤ, s0 =(s1[c2]c3)))

  iscyggen2(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c3, { hs0 ∈ c1 | ran((s1 ∈ ℤ ↦(s1[c2]hs0)))= c1 }, c1, c2)
  iscyg2(hs0, s1, c0, { hs0 ∈ c1 | ran((s1 ∈ ℤ ↦(s1[c2]hs0)))= c1 }, c1, c2)
  eqid({ hs0 ∈ c1 | ran((s1 ∈ ℤ ↦(s1[c2]hs0)))= c1 })
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.crab.s(s0, hs0, c1, ran((s1 ∈ ℤ ↦(s1[c2]hs0)))= c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, ran((s1 ∈ ℤ ↦(s1[c2]hs0))), c1)
  diff.crn.s(s0, (s1 ∈ ℤ ↦(s1[c2]hs0)))
  diff.cmpt.s(s0, s1, cz, (s1[c2]hs0))

  diff.hs0.c(c2)

blocks.name: iscygodd
blocks.content: Show that a group with an element the same order as the group is cyclic. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm iscygodd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccyg))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cod, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c2, c3), cfv(chash, c1)))
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, wcel(c0, ccyg), wcel(c0, cgrp), wne(crab(hs1, c1, wceq(crn(cmpt(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, c0), cv(hs1)))), c1)), emptycls))
  ne0d(crab(hs1, c1, wceq(crn(cmpt(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, c0), cv(hs1)))), c1)), c3, w0)
  mpbir2and(w0, wcel(c3, crab(hs1, c1, wceq(crn(cmpt(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, c0), cv(hs1)))), c1))), wcel(c3, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c3), cfv(chash, c1)))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wcel(c3, crab(hs1, c1, wceq(crn(cmpt(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, c0), cv(hs1)))), c1))), wa(wcel(c3, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, c3), cfv(chash, c1)))), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, cfn))
  sylibr(w0, wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(cfv(chash, c1), cn0))
  eqeltrrd(cfv(chash, c1), cn0, cfv(c2, c3), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(c2, c3), cn0), wcel(c3, c1))
  odcl(c3, c1, c2, c0)
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(cfv(chash, c1), cn0)), wcel(c1, universe))
  fvexi(c1, cbs, c0)
  hashclb(c1, universe)
  cyggenod(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, c3, crab(hs1, c1, wceq(crn(cmpt(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, c0), cv(hs1)))), c1)), c2, cfv(cmg, c0))
  iscyg2(hs1, hs0, c0, crab(hs1, c1, wceq(crn(cmpt(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, c0), cv(hs1)))), c1)), c1, cfv(cmg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmg, c0))
  eqid(crab(hs1, c1, wceq(crn(cmpt(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, c0), cv(hs1)))), c1)))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cmg, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cmg, c0))
}

  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Grp)

} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, c0 ∈ CycGrp, c0 ∈ Grp, { hs1 ∈ c1 | ran((hs0 ∈ ℤ ↦(hs0[(.g ` c0)]hs1)))= c1 } ≠ ∅)

  mpbir2and(w0, c3 ∈ { hs1 ∈ c1 | ran((hs0 ∈ ℤ ↦(hs0[(.g ` c0)]hs1)))= c1 }, c3 ∈ c1, (c2 ` c3)=(# ` c1))
  syl2anc(w0, (c3 ∈ { hs1 ∈ c1 | ran((hs0 ∈ ℤ ↦(hs0[(.g ` c0)]hs1)))= c1 } ↔(c3 ∈ c1 ∧(c2 ` c3)=(# ` c1))), c0 ∈ Grp, c1 ∈ Fin)

  cyggenod(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, c3, { hs1 ∈ c1 | ran((hs0 ∈ ℤ ↦(hs0[(.g ` c0)]hs1)))= c1 }, c2, (.g ` c0))
  iscyg2(hs1, hs0, c0, { hs1 ∈ c1 | ran((hs0 ∈ ℤ ↦(hs0[(.g ` c0)]hs1)))= c1 }, c1, (.g ` c0))
  eqid((.g ` c0))
  eqid({ hs1 ∈ c1 | ran((hs0 ∈ ℤ ↦(hs0[(.g ` c0)]hs1)))= c1 })

  diff.hs1.c(c3)

  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(co(c0, cress, cfv(c3, csn(c1))), ccyg))

  oveq2d(c0, cress, cfv(c3, csn(c1)), crn(cmpt(hs0, cz, co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, c0), c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)))

thm cycsubgcyg2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Grp ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(c0[|`s](c3 ` { c1 }))∈ CycGrp)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(mrCls `(SubGrp ` c0))
} = {
  eqeltrd((c0[|`s](c3 ` { c1 })), ccyg, (c0[|`s]ran((hs0 ∈ ℤ ↦(hs0[(.g ` c0)]c1)))), (c0 ∈ Grp ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  oveq2d(c0, cress, (c3 ` { c1 }), ran((hs0 ∈ ℤ ↦(hs0[(.g ` c0)]c1))), (c0 ∈ Grp ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  cycsubg2(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, (hs0 ∈ ℤ ↦(hs0[(.g ` c0)]c1)), (.g ` c0))
  eqid((hs0 ∈ ℤ ↦(hs0[(.g ` c0)]c1)))
  cycsubgcyg(hs0, c0, c1, c2, ran((hs0 ∈ ℤ ↦(hs0[(.g ` c0)]c1))), (.g ` c0))
  eqid((.g ` c0))
  eqid(ran((hs0 ∈ ℤ ↦(hs0[(.g ` c0)]c1))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((.g ` c0))
}
